quest.name: Working Up a Thirst
journal:
Error 5318008: Grebuloffs not found.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Irregular population fluctuations detected. Your assistance is required to search for two missing Grebuloffs.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analysis indicates insatiable curiosity and a proclivity for exploration in both units, making “voluntary expedition” the most likely explanation for their sudden disappearance.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: However, given the length of absence and approximate levels of danger in the surrounding areas, the likelihood that they currently face mortal peril exceeds recommended parameters.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Please initiate your search immediately and aid the return of the two missing Grebuloffs. In the event they have been reduced to pieces, please collect and return accordingly.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFA04616
dialogue.text:
Oh, would you look how it shimmers and shines! Be still my quivering whiskers!
...Hm? Can I help you?

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFA04616
dialogue.text: The others are looking for me? My apologies. So enraptured was I with this place, I completely lost track of time.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFA04616
dialogue.text: Glittering landmarks much like this one could once be seen in the waters of our home, but they carried a terrible sickness. I never dared to dream I might find anything so similar in a place such as this.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFA04616
dialogue.text: <sigh> Would that I could stay and behold its beauty a while longer, but as you say, my kin are worried. Another time, perhaps.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFB04616
dialogue.text: <grumble> <grumble> Oh, what I wouldn't do for something to eat...

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFB04616
dialogue.text: Bwaaah! Who... What are you doing here?

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFB04616
dialogue.text: I'm being called back home? But the Ea promised there would be food. It should be ready any moment now.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFB04616
dialogue.text: At least, that's what they told me. Yet no matter how long I wait, there has been nothing. <sigh> Perhaps I misunderstood when they invited me to join them in communal repast. I think I'll stop by the café on the way back, and eat something there.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFC04616
dialogue.text: I... <heave> I fear I've made a terrible mist─ <retch>

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFC04616
dialogue.text: Return home? Gladly. Seeing the dragons partake of the water, I thought it safe enough for a quick swim, but I was wrong. So very, very wrong...

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFC04616
dialogue.text: Well, I've given my stomach enough trouble for one day. I should be returning home. If you'll excuse me.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFD04616
dialogue.text: Hm? What brings you out here?

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFD04616
dialogue.text: Oh, I... I didn't mean to make the others worry. I stumbled upon these remains, and couldn't help but think of our fallen kin...

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFD04616
dialogue.text: Ahem. But now is not the time for sulking─it only serves to make the others worry. It was nice meeting you.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFE04616
dialogue.text: Hm...? Ah, my apologies. I was marveling at the craftsmanship of this place.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFE04616
dialogue.text: The others sent you to bring me home? Goodness, how long have I been away? It seems I lost track of time admiring all this metalwork.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFE04616
dialogue.text: Perhaps one of the service nodes at the café would be willing to tell me more about it.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFF04616
dialogue.text: Would you look at that eye? No doubt it keeps watch over everything in this space.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFF04616
dialogue.text: You came looking for me? Hopefully my absence hasn't caused too much of a stir. I was captivated by the giant eye there, and soon found myself lost in thought.

dialogue.name: GREBULOFFF04616
dialogue.text: Fear not─when I return, I intend to work twice as hard to make up for my time spent here. We will make an Elysion worth watching, just wait and see.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of wayward units confirmed. Influx of Grebuloff gratitude determined to be corollary.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: After the dissemination of verbal testimony by recently returned Grebuloffs, interest in the exploration of foreign regions has experienced a marked increase in other adventurous units.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Probability of future employment opportunities high. Rest and recuperation are advised.
